name: Blunder
effect:
Special: If you draw this card, you MUST play it. 

The Attack misses and the Director draws a card. 
-or-
You gain -2 Successes. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.

name: Miss
effect:
The Attack misses. 
-or-
You gain 0 Successes. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.

name: Partial Hit
effect:
The Attack does 50% Damage. 
-or-
You gain 1 Success, but the Director gains 1 Complication. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.

name: Hit
effect:
The Attack hits. 
-or-
You gain 1 Success. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.

name: Hit+
effect:
The Attack generates a point of Surge Charge. 
-or-
You gain 2 Successes. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.

name: Crit
effect:
The Attack generates a point of Surge Charge and deals x2 damage. 
-or-
You gain 3 Successes. 

Reload: When you play this card as an Action, discard all Reload Cards from your hand.
